Subject: The Dark Spark-halucenagen

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 The spark went down to his minion. The body was ready. All was ready. But 
his preperation was undone. Also he needed to bring in more allies. He put 
himself into his body and it came alive. he stood up and stretched. He was 
back once again. Three modes. Fully functional. He sent a comm to 
Hulucenagen. "I am ready young one. Please come to my coordinates. You will 
find that its doors are opened to you. You want to destroy the Destrons...I 
shall help you." This ship had been here since the arrival of the destrons. 
Unfortunatly for them only he knew about it. It was cloaked for now but that 
wouldnt last much longer. He sent a comm to some old friends of his. Soon the 
base would be alive again. His minion reactivated a chamber he had stolen 
from the old base. It would come useful with some new tinkering. Soon two 
other bots showed up in the base. Shocked to see thier old master alive and 
well. He turned on the hologram map and studied the present situation.

--part1_81.e756a71.28a77a16_boundary
